thread.title: Maroon 5 in Super Bowl halftime show?; Khloe nude; 'Rocky Horror' remake: AM Buzz
thread.title_full: Maroon 5 in Super Bowl halftime show?; Khloe nude; 'Rocky Horror' remake: AM Buzz

author: Geoff Herbert | gherbert@syracuse.com
title: Maroon 5 in Super Bowl halftime show?; Khloe nude; 'Rocky Horror' remake: AM Buzz
text:
Comments 
Will Maroon 5 perform at the Super Bowl halftime show? Bruno Mars is reportedly "curating" the 50th NFL championship game's music spectacle for Feb. 7, 2016, and the band is said to be in "extensive talks" to join the fun. Mars headlined the 2014 show with special guest Red Hot Chili Peppers, but word is he'll bring in multiple acts for this one. Maroon 5, Adam Levine and NFL have yet to comment on the latest rumors. » Read more at Billboard . 
While Lamar Odom is in recovery, Khloe Kardashian is posing nude for the cover of her first solo book, "Strong Looks Better Naked." The 31-year-old "Kardashians" star shows her bare butt on the book jacket, which folds out to a racy poster. "I am so excited about sharing my philosophy on how I live and the power of strength," she said. "I hope to be an inspiration to readers everywhere on how they can create their own true strength and beauty inside and out." The book, focusing on lifestyle, fitness and Khloe's life, hits stores Nov. 3. » See the racy image at E! News . 
Fox's upcoming TV remake of "The Rocky Horror Picture Show" has cast its star. Transgender "Orange is the New Black" actress Laverne Cox will play "sweet transvestite" Dr. Frank-N-Furter, the Transylvanian scientist played by Tim Curry in the 1975 movie. The new version of "Rocky Horror" is set to air next fall, likely near Halloween, but it won't be a live musical like "The Sound of Music" or the upcoming "Grease." » Read more at the New York Daily News . 
And Jeremy Renner is under fire (again) for his response to his "American Hustle" co-star Jennifer Lawrence's complaint about female actresses earning less than males. "That's not my job," Renner said. "When it comes to that sort of stuff I let other people deal with that." Lawrence was Hollywood's highest-paid actress last year with $52 million but still made less than some of "the lucky people with d-cks." » Read more at Business Insider .

AM Buzz is a weekday morning feature on syracuse.com where we'll post the latest in viral videos, trending topics, celebrity gossip and entertainment news.
